010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.plugin.filter.RankFilters;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
018import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
019
020/**
021 * <p>
022 * This is an implementation of the adaptive thresholder proposed by Niblack in
023 * [1]. See Sec. 9.2.2 of [2] for a detailed description. It comes in three
024 * different version, depending on the type of local support region:
025 * </p>
026 * <ul>
027 * <li>{@link Box}: uses a rectangular (box-shaped) support region;</li>
028 * <li>{@link Disk}: uses a circular (disk-shaped) support region (see [2], Alg.
029 * 9.8);</li>
030 * <li>{@link Gauss}: uses a 2D isotropic Gaussian support region (see [2], Alg.
031 * 9.9 and Prog. 9.2).</li>
032 * </ul>
033 * Note that {@link NiblackThresholder} itself is abstract and thus cannot be
034 * instantiated.
035 * <p>
036 * [1] W. Niblack. "An Introduction to Digital Image Processing". Prentice-Hall
037 * (1986). <br>
038 * [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
039 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
040 * </p>
041 * 
042 * @author WB
043 * @version 2022/08/01
044 */
045public abstract class NiblackThresholder implements AdaptiveThresholder {
046        
047        public enum RegionType { Box, Disk, Gauss }
048        
049        /**
050         * Parameters for class {@link NiblackThresholder}.
051         */
052        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
053                
054                @DialogLabel("Radius")
055                public int radius = 15;
056                
057                @DialogLabel("kappa")
058                public double kappa = 0.30;
059                
060                @DialogLabel("d_min")
061                public int dMin = 5;
062                
063                @DialogLabel("Background mode")
064                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
065        }
066        
067        private final Parameters params;
068        FloatProcessor Imean;
069        FloatProcessor Isigma;
070
071        private NiblackThresholder() {
072                this(new Parameters());
073        }
074
075        private NiblackThresholder(Parameters params) {
076                super();
077                this.params = params;
078        }
079        
080        // method to be implemented by real sub-classes:
081        abstract void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius);
082        
083        @Override
084        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor I) {
085                final int M = I.getWidth();
086                final int N = I.getHeight();
087                makeMeanAndVariance(I, params.radius);
088                ByteProcessor Q = new ByteProcessor(M, N);
089                final double kappa = params.kappa;
090                final int dMin = params.dMin;
091                final boolean darkBg = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK);
092                
093                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
094                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
095                                double sigma = Isigma.getf(u, v);
096                                double mu = Imean.getf(u, v);
097                                double diff = kappa * sigma + dMin;
098                                int q = (int) Math.rint((darkBg) ? mu + diff : mu - diff);
099                                if (q < 0)       q = 0;
100                                if (q > 255) q = 255;
101                                Q.set(u, v, q);
102                        }
103                }
104                return Q;
105        }
106        
107        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
108        
109        /**
110         * Static convenience method for creating a {@link NiblackThresholder} with
111         * a specific support region type.
112         * Note that {@link NiblackThresholder} itself is abstract and cannot be instantiated
113         * (see concrete sub-types {@link Box}, {@link Disk}, {@link Gauss}).
114         * 
115         * @param regType support region type
116         * @param params other parameters
117         * @return an instance of {@link NiblackThresholder}
118         */
119        public static NiblackThresholder create(RegionType regType, Parameters params) {
120                switch (regType) {
121                case Box :              return new NiblackThresholder.Box(params);
122                case Disk :     return new NiblackThresholder.Disk(params);
123                case Gauss : return new NiblackThresholder.Gauss(params);
124                default :               return null;
125                }
126        }
127        
128        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
129        
130        /**
131         * Implementation of Niblack's adaptive thresholder using a
132         * rectangular (box-shaped) support region 
133         * (concrete implementation of abstract class {@link NiblackThresholder}).
134         */
135        public static class Box extends NiblackThresholder {
136
137                /**
138                 * Constructor using default parameters.
139                 */
140                public Box() {
141                        super();
142                }
143                
144                /**
145                 * Constructor with specific parameters.
146                 * @param params parameters
147                 */
148                public Box(Parameters params) {
149                        super(params);
150                }
151
152                @Override
153                void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
154                        int M = I.getWidth();
155                        int N = I.getHeight();
156                        Imean =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
157                        Isigma =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
158                        final int n = (radius + 1 + radius) * (radius + 1 + radius);
159
160                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
161                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
162                                        long A = 0;     // sum of image values in support region
163                                        long B = 0;     // sum of squared image values in support region
164                                        for (int j = -radius; j <= radius; j++) {
165                                                for (int i = -radius; i <= radius; i++) {
166                                                        int p = getPaddedPixel(I, u + i, v + j); // this is slow!
167                                                        A = A + p;
168                                                        B = B + p * p;
169                                                }
170                                        }
171                                        Imean.setf(u, v, (float) A / n);
172                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, (float) Math.sqrt((B - (double) (A * A) / n) / n));
173                                }
174                        }
175                }
176                
177                // TODO: change to use an ImageAccessor!
178                private int getPaddedPixel(ByteProcessor bp, int u, int v) {
179                        final int w = bp.getWidth();
180                        final int h = bp.getHeight();
181                        if (u < 0)
182                                u = 0;
183                        else if (u >= w)
184                                u = w - 1;
185                        if (v < 0)
186                                v = 0;
187                        else if (v >= h)
188                                v = h - 1;
189                        return bp.get(u, v);
190                }
191                
192        }
193        
194        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
195        
196        /**
197         * Implementation of Niblack's adaptive thresholder using a
198         * circular (disk-shaped) support region 
199         * (concrete implementation of abstract class {@link NiblackThresholder}).
200         */
201        public static class Disk extends NiblackThresholder {
202                
203                /**
204                 * Constructor using default parameters.
205                 */
206                public Disk() {
207                        super();
208                }
209                
210                /**
211                 * Constructor with specific parameters.
212                 * @param params parameters
213                 */
214                public Disk(Parameters params) {
215                        super(params);
216                }
217
218                @Override
219                void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
220                        FloatProcessor mean = (FloatProcessor) I.convertToFloat();
221                        FloatProcessor var =  (FloatProcessor) mean.duplicate();
222                        
223                        RankFilters rf = new RankFilters();
224                        rf.rank(mean, radius, RankFilters.MEAN);
225                        Imean = mean;
226                        
227                        rf.rank(var, radius, RankFilters.VARIANCE);
228                        var.sqrt();
229                        Isigma = var;
230                }
231        }
232        
233        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
234        
235        /**
236         * Implementation of Niblack's adaptive thresholder using a
237         * 2D Gaussian support region 
238         * (concrete implementation of abstract class {@link NiblackThresholder}).
239         */
240        public static class Gauss extends NiblackThresholder {
241                
242                /**
243                 * Constructor using default parameters.
244                 */
245                public Gauss() {
246                        super();
247                }
248                
249                /**
250                 * Constructor with specific parameters.
251                 * @param params parameters
252                 */
253                public Gauss(Parameters params) {
254                        super(params);
255                }
256                
257                @Override
258                void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int r) {
259                        // //uses ImageJ's GaussianBlur
260                        // local variance over square of size (size + 1 + size)^2
261                        int M = I.getWidth();
262                        int N = I.getHeight();
263                        
264                        Imean = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
265                        Isigma = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
266
267                        FloatProcessor A = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
268                        FloatProcessor B = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
269                        B.sqr();
270                        
271                        double sigma = r * 0.6; // sigma of Gaussian filter should be approx. 0.6 of the disk's radius
272                        
273//                      GaussianBlur gb = new GaussianBlur();
274//                      gb.blurFloat(A, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
275//                      gb.blurFloat(B, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
276                        
277                        GenericFilter gaussian = new GaussianFilterSeparable(sigma);
278                        gaussian.applyTo(A);
279                        gaussian.applyTo(B);
280
281                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
282                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
283                                        float a = A.getf(u, v);
284                                        float b = B.getf(u, v);
285                                        float sigmaG = (float) Math.sqrt(b - a * a);
286                                        Imean.setf(u, v, a);
287                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, sigmaG);
288                                }
289                        }
290                }
291        }
292        
293}
